issue.title: Empty __init__.py Module
issue.description: The __init__.py file is completely empty, providing no module exports or initialization
issue.recommendation: Add proper module exports using __all__ to define the public API, or add documentation explaining why this module is intentionally empty

issue.title: Missing __all__ Export Declaration
issue.description: Project patterns (rules 23, 25, 55) require integration modules to have proper __init__.py with exports using __all__ declaration
issue.recommendation: Add __all__ = [] or appropriate exports to follow project conventions for controlled public API

issue.title: No Module Interface Definition
issue.description: The payment_gateways integration module lacks any interface definition, making it unclear what functionality should be exposed
issue.recommendation: Define the payment gateway interface with base classes, protocols, or at minimum a docstring explaining the module's purpose

issue.title: Missing Module Documentation
issue.description: No docstring present to explain the purpose and structure of the payment_gateways integration module
issue.recommendation: Add a module-level docstring explaining the payment gateway integration architecture and available implementations

issue.title: Placeholder Module Without Implementation
issue.description: Empty __init__.py suggests this is a placeholder for future implementation or an incomplete module
issue.recommendation: Either implement the payment gateway integration or add a TODO comment with implementation timeline

review.summary: Empty __init__.py file for the payment_gateways integration module. This appears to be a placeholder for future payment gateway integrations. The file lacks any exports, documentation, or interface definitions, which violates project conventions requiring proper __all__ declarations in integration modules.

positive_observations.observation: File exists in the correct location following project structure for integration modules
No security vulnerabilities present due to empty implementation
No performance issues as there is no code to execute

context.tests: No test files found for payment_gateways module
context.documentation: No documentation present in the module
context.configuration: No payment gateway configuration files detected
